translations: n.猛冲者；搅拌装置；精力充沛的人；气宇轩昂的男子

phrs.translation: 冲击者, 猛冲者, 奶油搅拌器, 气宇轩昂的男子
达舍尔, 艾瑞卡·达舍尔, 达瑞尔, 艾瑞卡
搅乳棒, 搅乳装置, 搅动翼
单饼小滑车, 信号索滑车

sentences.sentence: Now Dasher! now, Dancer! now, Prancer and Vixen!
sentences.translation: 前进！猛冲者、跳舞者、凶婆娘和闪电！

sentences.sentence: Friendship is to our life what salt is to dasher.
sentences.translation: 友谊是我们的生命是什么盐搅拌装置。

sentences.sentence: With a traditional 96" dasher board panel weighing between 150lbs (aluminum) and 300lbs (steel), any system you choose needs to support heavy weights."
sentences.translation: 由于传统96“搅拌器宽面板重150磅（铝）到300磅（钢）之间，你选择的任何系统必须支承较重的重量。
